attributes.title: Primary Intent
attributes.description: The primary purpose or goal of the customer contact

attributes.title: Customer Sentiment
attributes.description: The emotional tone of the customer during the conversation

attributes.title: Resolution Status
attributes.description: Whether the customer's issue was resolved during the conversation

attributes.title: Fee Type
attributes.description: Type of fee discussed in the conversation

attributes.title: Fee Amount
attributes.description: The monetary amount of the fee

attributes.title: Fee Waived
attributes.description: Whether the fee was waived or reduced
